remarks: A permutation of a set fixing an element of the set.  (Contributed by AV, 4-Jan-2019.)
statement:
symgfixf.p $e |- P = ( Base ` ( SymGrp ` N ) ) $.
symgfixf.q $e |- Q = { q e. P | ( q ` K ) = K } $.
symgfixelq $p |- ( F e. V -> ( F e. Q <-> ( F : N -1-1-onto-> N /\ ( F ` K ) = K ) ) ) $.
$d K q $.
$d P q $.
